Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Server contains the main to create a server that manages the clients, allowing them to communicate and playing a game.

Following the tutor's tips:

  • -The server accepts connections without blocking itself and asking to the first user the players number to start the match
  • -The server start the match as soon as 3 users connects
  • -When 2 users are connected, a timer is scheduled: after XX seconds the match starts with 2 players
  • -If 2 players are in the waiting room and one of them disconnects, the timer is deleted

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server​(int port)

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      public void startServer()
      Prepares the server to listen to clients and to accept their connection increasing their id. It also creates a ServerSocketHandler for each client and sends them a WelcomeEvent

    • registerConnection

      public void registerConnection​(ServerSocketHandler connection)
      Adds a connection to the list of connections saved on the server
      Parameters:
      connection - New user connection

    • unregisterConnection

      public void unregisterConnection​(ServerSocketHandler connection)
      Removes the client's connection from the list of registered connections. If the client disconnecting was the second one, the timer is reset so that the game can not begin with only one player
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection of the disconnecting client

    • isLobbyFull

      public boolean isLobbyFull()
      Returns true if the game started after waiting for a certain time to make sure that the game is not starting when called.
      Returns:
      true when the game start with two or three players

    • loginUser

      public void loginUser​(java.lang.String username, ServerSocketHandler connection)
      Manages a user's connection: if the lobby is not full and the submitted username has not been already take, the client is accepted into the lobby and a InLobbyEvent is sent.

      We decided, after consulting the tutor, that the lobby holds up to 3 players; once 2 players have arrived a timer is scheduled and if it expires before the third player arrives, the match begins. If the lobby fills with 3 players the match starts

      Parameters:
      username - client's name
      connection - client's connection

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()

    • disconnectAll

      protected void disconnectAll​(ServerSocketHandler connection)
      Disconnects users after a user disconnects or there is a winner
      Parameters:
      connection - Socket of the lost connection

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
